1.name: Maria Petrova
1.text: The installation team was very professional and the air conditioner works perfectly. Energy consumption is lower than expected. I recommend CDL to everyone!

2.name: George Dimitrov
2.text: The water purification system changed our lives. The water at home now has excellent taste and quality. Installation was quick and hassle-free.

3.name: Stefan Ivanov
3.text: Excellent prices and fast delivery. The 5-year warranty gives me peace of mind. Customer support was incredibly helpful with my questions.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: ClimaSite was founded with a simple mission: to provide high-quality HVAC solutions that make homes and businesses more comfortable. Over the years, we've grown from a small local shop to a leading online retailer, serving thousands of satisfied customers.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To deliver exceptional climate control products and services that enhance comfort, improve energy efficiency, and exceed customer expectations.

values.title: Our Values

values.sustainabilityDesc: We promote energy-efficient solutions that are better for your wallet and the planet.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common HVAC questions

sizing.question: How do I know what size HVAC system I need?
sizing.answer: The size of your HVAC system depends on several factors including your home's square footage, insulation quality, number of windows, and local climate. A professional can perform a Manual J load calculation to determine the exact size needed. Generally, you need about 20 BTUs per square foot, but this can vary significantly based on your specific situation.

maintenance.question: How often should I service my HVAC system?
maintenance.answer: We recommend having your HVAC system professionally serviced at least twice a year - once in spring before cooling season and once in fall before heating season. Additionally, you should replace or clean your air filters every 1-3 months depending on usage and filter type.

efficiency.question: What SEER rating should I look for?
efficiency.answer: SEER (Seasonal Energy Efficiency Ratio) measures cooling efficiency. The minimum SEER for new systems is 14, but we recommend SEER 16 or higher for optimal efficiency and energy savings. Higher SEER units cost more upfront but provide significant long-term savings on energy bills.

warranty.question: What warranty do your products come with?
warranty.answer: Most of our HVAC equipment comes with manufacturer warranties ranging from 5 to 10 years on parts. Extended warranties are available for purchase. Professional installation is required to maintain warranty coverage on most products.

installation.question: Do you offer professional installation services?
installation.answer: Yes, we partner with certified HVAC technicians across the country to provide professional installation services. Professional installation ensures your system operates at peak efficiency and maintains warranty coverage. Contact us for a free installation quote.
